abstract: Hailed as the path forward for a Wall Street in disarray, the merger between Bank of America and Merrill Lynch offered Merrill a chance to rebound from billions of dollars in mortgage-related mistakes and gave Bank of America access to Merrill’s well-known brand and its vast network of brokers, known as the thundering herd.
lead_paragraph: Hailed as the path forward for a Wall Street in disarray, the merger between Bank of America and Merrill Lynch offered Merrill a chance to rebound from billions of dollars in mortgage-related mistakes and gave Bank of America access to Merrill’s well-known brand and its vast network of brokers, known as the thundering herd.

headline.main: For Bank of America and Merrill, Love Was Blind
